Posts.Content: PaulAK123 wrote: ---as my breasts have changed sizes. But--I just did a self-breast exam and I'm scared. I have always had 'dense' breasts, but this feels different. My breasts are painful, both, but they feel like there are a lot of big, hard masses in both breasts. Some smaller ones, but mostly large, hard, dense, masses. The top quadrant on the right side hurts the most. I noticed my breasts got much heavier and denser over the past few months, but I attributed it to weight gain/stress/hormonal changes....but now I am worried. Will call my doctor as soon as the sun comes up. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: I thought I had gained weight -- PaulAK123 Moderators

Posts.Content: May 17, 2016 03:03AM PaulAK123 wrote: Thanks for responding, Diane. I'm going at 3PM today to see my doctor. Will keep you posted.
